titles.title: To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide for standard forms under the Medicare Program for certifications of medical necessity and certifications of terminal illness.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Ways and Means, and in addition to the Committee on Commerce, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
Referred to House Ways and Means
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health and Environment, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Chairman.

term.name: Department of Health and Human Services

bill.summary: 10/7/1997--Introduced. Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to direct the Secretary of Health and Human Services to publish a standard form for certificates of medical necessity and certificates of terminal illness.
